title: Bugs
steps: Navigate to the account information section of the application.
Inspect the page source or network requests to identify any exposed sensitive data or endpoints.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the exposure of account information through the application's initial page load or JavaScript files before any authentication redirects occur. This can lead to unauthorized access to sensitive data.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it primarily involves inspecting the page source or network requests, which are common practices in security testing. There are no complex interactions or states involved.
